name: Conan Exiles: Day One Edition
summary: ou can now pre-order the physical Day One Edition for PC, Xbox One, and PlayStation 4 (currently available in select territories with select retailers, with more on the way). Not only does it come in a pretty cool box (check out the pictures below!), it also includes a full-color print map of the Exiled Lands along with an exclusive in-game item you can use from launch: Conan’s Atlantean Sword!
